com.tealium.internal.tagbridge

Class RemoteCommand.Response

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tealium.internal.tagbridge.RemoteCommand.Response
  • Enclosing class:
    RemoteCommand

    public static class RemoteCommand.Response
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows a RemoteCommand respond to a TagBridge request.

    This class can only send a single response, if multiple responses are attempted an IllegalStateException will be thrown on any send and set operations.

    Since:
    2014-12-08

      static int STATUS_BAD_REQUEST
      Suggested value for setStatus(int) when getRequestPayload() does not provide the expected arguments.

      • STATUS_BAD_REQUEST

        public static final int STATUS_BAD_REQUEST
        Suggested value for setStatus(int) when getRequestPayload() does not provide the expected arguments.
        See Also:

      • STATUS_OK

        public static final int STATUS_OK
        Suggested value for setStatus(int) when the operation was performed successfully.

        This is the default value.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteCommand.Response

        public RemoteCommand.Response(java.lang.String commandId,
                      java.lang.String responseId,
                      JSONObject requestPayload)
        Parameters:
        commandId - The TagBridge request command id.
        responseId - A response id or null.
        requestPayload - A parsed JSONObject of the TagBridge Request Payload or null. If null, an empty JSONObject is returned by getRequestPayload().
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when mCommandId is null.

    • Method Detail

      • getCommandId

        public final java.lang.String getCommandId()
        Returns:
        the command id of the TagBridge request, this will match the RemoteCommand instance's command name this object has been passed to.

      • getId

        public final java.lang.String getId()
        Returns:
        the response_id if specified; otherwise, null.

      • isSent

        public final boolean isSent()
        Returns:
        whether send() was called.

      • getRequestPayload

        public final JSONObject getRequestPayload()
        Returns:
        the payload (arguments used to invoke the RemoteCommand) passed by the request; if there were none, an empty JSONObject is provided.

      • getStatus

        public final int getStatus()
        Returns:
        the current status set by setStatus(int), STATUS_OK by default.

      • setStatus

        public final RemoteCommand.Response setStatus(int status)
        Parameters:
        status - to be returned to the TagBridge callback, typically STATUS_OK or STATUS_BAD_REQUEST.
        Returns:
        this for method chaining.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when send() has already been called.

      • getBody

        public final java.lang.String getBody()
        Returns:
        the currently set body, may be null.

      • setBody

        public final RemoteCommand.Response setBody(java.lang.String body)
        Parameters:
        body - to be returned to the TagBridge callback, can be any string or null.
        Returns:
        this for method chaining.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when send() has already been called.

      • send

        public void send()
        Invokes the TagBridge callback.

        The status and body as specified by setStatus(int) and setBody(String) are passed as the argument to the callback.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when multiple calls of this method are attempted.
